services.title: Remote Tech Support
services.headline: Instant help without a house call.
services.summary: We connect to your computer over a secure connection to solve issues, provide training, or configure security, no matter where you are.

services.title: Remote Security Assessment
services.headline: Evaluate and strengthen your setup — remotely.
services.summary: We audit your system security remotely, identify weak points, and help you fix them without needing to be on-site.

services.title: Privacy Hardening & Digital Safety
services.headline: Lock down your data — wherever you are.
services.summary: We guide you through privacy tools, encrypted messaging, VPNs, and browser hardening via remote session.

services.title: 1-on-1 Remote Tech Training
services.headline: Learn securely and confidently — at your pace.
services.summary: We offer remote training sessions on everything from cybersecurity basics to using your devices more confidently.

services.title: Remote Virus & Malware Removal
services.headline: Remove threats without anyone stepping foot inside.
services.summary: We remotely scan for and remove malware, spyware, and other threats using secure tools. Fast, safe, and private.

services.title: Remote Tech Tutoring & Mentoring
services.headline: Learn coding, cybersecurity, or IT skills one-on-one.
services.summary: We offer personalized tutoring for students, professionals, and hobbyists. Learn programming, virtualization, networking, Linux, cybersecurity, or general tech literacy.
